item.title: The Open Source Influencer
item.description: I’ve been interested in tech content creation recently and have been trying to guess the future of this modern programming career path. I’m constantly intrigued by devs who are able to escape wage slave jobs and become self sufficient somehow, whether it is by starting a business (the old way) or the new ways of social media influencing or content creation. Creating a software company definitely seems to be much harder nowadays in software than it was, say, 10-15 years ago, and A LOT less enjoyable than the scenarios I present below.
